Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.resourcecontainers

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.resourcecontainers.ResourceContainer
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.resourcecontainers.Shelf
Direct Known Subclasses:
ResourceShelf, Warehouse.WarehouseShelf
public class Shelf extends ResourceContainer
This class represents a finite container of resources of the same type.
